snippet: Prime Minister Vladimir V. Putin pledged to reduce the number of Russian officials who are allowed to bypass traffic jams by ignoring basic rules of the road.
abstract: Russian Prime Min Vladimir V Putin pledges to crack down on special privileges held by officials that allow them to bypass traffic jams by ignoring basic rules of the road, including speed limits; Muscovites have grown weary of traffic stops that occur daily to clear the way for motorcades.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Vladimir V. Putin pledged to reduce the number of Russian officials who are allowed to bypass traffic jams by ignoring basic rules of the road.

headline.seo: Putin Pledges to Limit Officials’ Traffic Privileges
headline.main: Putin to Cut List of Officials Who Can Flout Traffic Rules
headline.print_headline: Putin to Cut List of Officials Who Can Flout Traffic Rules
